医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
布鲁克推出具有高速 OptoVolt 电压成像的创新神经科学研究解决方案新的多光子显微镜模块能够以单神经元分辨率实现毫秒神经事件成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Bruker-Introduces-Innovative-Neuroscience-Research-Solution-with-High-Speed-OptoVolt-Voltage-Imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Bruker-Introduces-Innovative-Neuroscience-Research-Solution-with-High-Speed-OptoVolt-Voltage-Imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17305425-eef9-4298-9de4-462f62d0aa09 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 11:53:00 -0400 Bruker Introduces Innovative Neuroscience Research Solution with High-Speed OptoVolt Voltage Imaging
新细胞疗法为T细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病患者提供有效治疗一种针对白血病细胞上的 CD7 的新细胞疗法，为已经用尽所有标准治疗方案的 T 细胞急性淋巴细胞白血病 (T-ALL) 患者提供了一种潜在有效的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-cell-therapy-offers- effective-treatment-for-病人-with-T-cell-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-cell-therapy-offers- effective-treatment-for-病人-with-T-cell-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05172b55-37c8-4035-89a5-641f722acb00 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 10:33:27 -0400 New cell therapy offers effective treatment for patients with T-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia
一剂 HPV 疫苗可以消除加拿大的宫颈癌CMAJ（加拿大医学协会杂志）的新模型建议，加拿大疫苗接种计划可以改用一剂中性人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 疫苗接种方法并消除宫颈癌 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/ 10.1503/cmaj.240787。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/One-dose-HPV-vaccination-could-eliminate-cervical-cancer-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/One-dose-HPV-vaccination-could-eliminate-cervical-cancer-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91c46fae-f70a-4101-8193-87e923419793 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 10:13:52 -0400 One-dose HPV vaccination could eliminate cervical cancer in Canada
新研究强调了耻辱对健康公平的影响《自然评论疾病入门》上发表的一篇新文章强调了耻辱在医疗保健中可以发挥的深远作用，以及解决与耻辱相关的障碍如何能够显着改善世界各地个人和社区的健康结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-research-highlights-the-impact-of-stigma-on-health-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/New-research-highlights-the-impact-of-stigma-on-health-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6da2b77f-fdb7-495b-b54e-2c7f147e554f Mon, 07 Oct 2024 09:48:45 -0400 New research highlights the impact of stigma on health equity
抗原图谱揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 免疫差异一个人对 SARS-CoV-2（导致 COVID-19 的病毒）变体的免疫反应取决于他们之前的接触情况，而免疫反应重点的差异将有助于科学家了解未来如何优化疫苗以提供广泛的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Antigenic-mapping-sheds-light-on-SARS-CoV-2-immunity-differences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Antigenic-mapping-sheds-light-on-SARS-CoV-2-immunity-differences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73448811-b83d-4528-9461-bfcfbac61fa4 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 09:36:17 -0400 Antigenic mapping sheds light on SARS-CoV-2 immunity differences
单细胞基因组学揭开了人类微生物组的秘密人类微生物组在我们的健康中发挥着至关重要的作用，影响从疾病发展到治疗反应的一切。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Single-cell-genomics-unveils-secrets-of-the- human-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Single-cell-genomics-unveils-secrets-of-the- human-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7752ef22-7cb2-4e6f-898a-9f4c98e43a29 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 09:21:25 -0400 Single-cell genomics unveils secrets of the human microbiome
研究揭示精神科药物试验中的赞助偏倚据报道，新的研究显示，在由药物制造商资助的临床试验中，精神科药物的疗效比由其他团体资助的同一种药物的试验效果高出约 50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-reveals-sponsorship-bias-in-psychiatric-drug-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-reveals-sponsorship-bias-in-psychiatric-drug-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b424d448-4dd5-49b6-a525-671f56cb0080 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 09:11:40 -0400 Study reveals sponsorship bias in psychiatric drug trials
研究揭示了预防脂肪肝的潜在新策略高脂肪饮食和肥胖导致肝脏脂肪堆积，并正成为日益普遍的全球健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-sheds-light-on-a-pottial-new-strategy-to-prevent-fatty-liver.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Study-sheds-light-on-a-pottial-new-strategy-to-prevent-fatty-liver.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f09e768-ee22-4218-a769-892400a9e88a Mon, 07 Oct 2024 08:24:00 -0400 Study sheds light on a potential new strategy to prevent fatty liver
澳大利亚年轻人面临停滞的预期寿命趋势澳大利亚国立大学 (ANU) 的最新研究显示，50 岁以下的澳大利亚人的预期寿命停滞不前，而年龄较大的人群，尤其是男性，寿命更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Young-Australians-face-stagnate-life-expectancy-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Young-Australians-face-stagnate-life-expectancy-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=81db1971-ccd8-4563-a6cc-1a8107534e0f Mon, 07 Oct 2024 08:17:23 -0400 Young Australians face stagnating life expectancy trends
全面审查凸显烟草控制措施的影响尽管在国家和国际层面采取了广泛的控制措施，但烟草使用仍然是一个重大的全球健康挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Compressive-review-highlights-impact-of-tobacco-control-measures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241007/Compressive-review-highlights-impact-of-tobacco-control-measures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a226f7d-be10-4ba6-8a35-0515c45f0052 Mon, 07 Oct 2024 08:04:55 -0400 Comprehensive review highlights impact of tobacco control measures
